1.title: The Elephant in the Room
1.plot: Two unlikely friends, Martin and Omar, run a floundering business, (Touring T.O.) offering tours of Toronto in a yellow rickshaw. After several underhanded attempts to attract customers, they book a tourist with a condition: they must guide him to a unique landmark he has never seen before. What they choose to show him in the Christie Pitts neighborhood is as fascinating as it is weird.

2.title: Love and Pain at the Waverly Hotel
2.plot: Martin and Omar now exclusively offer tours of Toronto's unique landmarks, overlooked by other tour companies. The boys consider hiring Samantha, a recent college grad, to be their intern. But she's not just interested in paperwork and cleaning. Soon the gang is in Toronto's oldest and strangest hotel, where even Martin and Omar are surprised by its fascinating past.

3.title: A Bridge to Nowhere
3.plot: Omar has received a text from Marie Anne, his "lost love", requesting a meeting. Meanwhile, Martin and Samantha are taken hostage by a mysterious, snake-wielding man, intent on finding Omar and dragging him back to India. Hidden pasts come to light, including one of Toronto's largest landmarks, hidden from the public eye for many years.

4.title: Publishing Fear
4.plot: Samantha discovers Martin and Omar have kidnapped an employee of a rival tour company on the same day they have booked a royal couple for a tour of Toronto's oldest printing house. The gang scrambles to salvage the situation and impress the influential couple.

5.title: I Have a Sinking Feeling
5.plot: The snake the gang released has bred, and its vicious offspring have overrun the city, destroying the tourism industry. Samantha manages to find a customer on the condition that they give a nautical themed tour. Big surprises are in store when Martin tries to take the gang to Toronto's largest floating landmark.

6.title: The Ghosts of Tours Past
6.plot: Martin and Omar attempt to avoid the city's "Snake Plague" by giving a ghost tour on Toronto Island with disastrous results. Frustrated by their inability to find customers, the gang attempts to solve the snake problem once and for all.

7.title: A Rickshaw to Die For
7.plot: Nothing is as it seems while the Touring T.O. gang fights for success. A surprising tour of Fort York leads to a confrontation with an old enemy. The gang must risk life and limb to keep the company alive.

8.title: It's Only a Rickshaw
8.plot: The future of Touring T.O. is uncertain as all seems lost. The gang must face their toughest challenges as consequences from past choices all come to a head.

imdb.plot outline: Touring T.O. is an eight part mini-series about two unlikely friends, Martin and Omar, and their intern, Samantha. Together they run a low-budget rickshaw tour company that specializes in taking tourists to the unique and obscure landmarks of Toronto. If the company fails, Omar will lose his work visa and Martin will be violating the conditions of his parole. Together, the Touring T.O. crew struggle to keep the company afloat while dealing with tourists as strange as the landmarks they visit.
imdb.title: Touring T.O.
plot: _Touring T.O._ (qv) is an eight part mini-series about two unlikely friends, Martin and Omar, and their intern, Samantha. Together they run a low-budget rickshaw tour company that specializes in taking tourists to the unique and obscure landmarks of Toronto. If the company fails, Omar will lose his work visa and Martin will be violating the conditions of his parole. Together, the _Touring T.O._ (qv) crew struggle to keep the company afloat while dealing with tourists as strange as the landmarks they visit.::Crazy Shirt Productions
